thread.title: Week 9: Follow updates about tonight's games right here
thread.title_full: Week 9: Follow updates about tonight's games right here

author: Staff report
title: Week 9: Follow updates about tonight's games right here
text: Posted Oct. 23, 2015 at 5:30 PM By Staff report Posted Oct. 23, 2015 at 5:30 PM » RELATED CONTENT • FINAL SCORES: Look for them here after the games Week 9 of the high school football season is here. Keep track of tonight's action by heading over to our Prep Football website, preps.sj-r.com , and following our sportswriters and SJ-R.com Score Spotters, who will be tweeting updates about games they are watching. Are you attending or listening to a game? Tweet a message and/or a photo with the hashtag #sjrpreps and we'll add it to the conversation. Useful game night links: * GAME NIGHT WEBSITE : At preps.sj-r.com , which works on your desktop or mobile device, you'll find the latest updates via Twitter from our sportswriters covering the games. We also have a game-night scoreboard , standings and schedules . * FROM OUR SPORTS DEPARTMENT : Our latest articles about high school football, including previews for this week's action. Full game stories begin appearing on this website around 10:30 p.m. * TEXT ALERTS: Sign up here to receive text message alerts about final scores for your favorite Central State Eight and Sangamo conference football teams. By Staff report
